/* History */  Removed "Middle East" and replaced it with West Asia.  Technically, there is NO SUCH place as "Middle East".  It is in fact a derogatory phrase that insults.  "Middle East" is a slang term and the region is officially West Asia.
/* History */  Correct name for region of origin was Persia in referenced time line, and so indicated this, while still  leaving indication of modern names as being Iran and Afghanistan.
/* Nutrition */ editing this section to discuss factual nutrients; removed text was off topic & poorly referenced; provide new ref for nutrient content from USDA Nutrient Database
